definitions.definition: (of separate elements) To join into a single mass or whole.
definitions.example: The droplets coalesced into a puddle.

definitions.definition: (of a whole or a unit) To form from different pieces or elements.
definitions.example: The puddle coalesced from the droplets as they ran together.

definitions.definition: To bond pieces of metal into a continuous whole by liquefying parts of each piece, bringing the liquids into contact, and allowing the combined liquid to solidify.
